attributes.action: Reform the Court of Protection by i) simplifying the Court of Protection forms and ii) speeding up the judicial process.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Presently, the Court of Protection forms are unnecessarily long & complex(often a tick box format would suffice).  Also, the Court of Protection is painstakingly slow & protracted i.e. it is not unusual for cases to take up to a year to grind though the wheels of justice: very slow indeed. This unnecessary bureaucracy causes problems and distress for vulnerable adults & their families e.g. if a Power of Attorney is revoked there is likely to be a 'void' period of several months during which time the vulnerable person's affairs are in disarray e.g. care fees unpaid (which is damaging to business), bank accounts exposed &/or inaccessible, property deteriorating, bills not being paid, no authority for sanctioning medical intervention if required etc.
There has been much criticism from the press of this sorry state of affairs & its high time matters were taken in hand. If an injunction through the Civil Courts can take just a couple of weeks, then the same time frame is expected for the affairs of a vulnerable adult.  Their protection must be swift and effecient.  Presently, it is neither.
